channel.title: Annoying ass shop problem
channel.description:
[s]I'm trying to get this shop working, soon, and it won't work >.<! I used a shop generator by Jaywalker to make this shop, and placed it exactly in the correct places... Doesn't feel like going into the client, though. -.-'[/s] Fixed. ^^""" I was just naming something wrong... :\ Silly me :D
[s]Also, can someone tell me how to make myself OWNER? Not co-owner. My rights ARE set to 3...[/s][br][br] Fixed. [size=1]Posted on: August 19, 2009, 12:40:18 pm[/size][hr]
Everything solved, thx ppl.

item.title: Annoying ass shop problem
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

vexx1345:

go to client.java(the notepad one) serverside and search for the scource owner (reapagescape: the reaper ect.) cahnge the name in the “” to your name then save and compile

Thanks it worked.

Now maybe someone can answer one of my other questions. :x

Read full topic

item.title: Annoying ass shop problem
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

Okay, I’m assuming you’re using Sk1ttl3zrule43v base.

So lets get this rollin’:

  1. For the death respawn just search for “deathStage”
  2. For the co-owner thing, it probably has a certain name in client class and you need to change it.
  3. For the shops, try changing the "1"s to "2"s

Read full topic

@Epic_Ancient wrote:

Well, no. There aren’t any character profiles that came with the source. (Lmao-scape source)
That doesn’t work, because my character rights ARE 3. Read? :
It’s something to do with a restriction he put on. Lmao-scape source is just an edited allstarscape source, overall. Very well edited, and I’m further editing it to my version of perfection

Read full topic

item.title: Annoying ass shop problem
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r
item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

accually if you want co owner here are the rights and wat you have to do,
got to your characters folder and find your username change his rights to

0- normal user
1- moderator
2- administrator
3- co-owner/ owner
4- (ON MOST SERVERS) hidden owner (no crown, but owner rights such as ::pickup or ::npc)

now if you are using a source that you downloaded open your client.java and rename the original name that the guy used to yours such as just open client.java and go to edit and replace and replace his like say it was “PKown3r” or something and replace it with yours and click replace all.

that should give you owner, your crown may not look any different depending on the client you are using and if it has custom crowns or not. also if it does have cusotm crowns most client the custom crown will only show up on your screen, everyone else will see u with a gold crown.

Read full topic

item.title: Annoying ass shop problem
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

Ower- 3 is the owner you just havent changed the login warnings, try CTRL F and Co - owner and change it to owner, there IS NO higher rights than 3.
3- owner
2- admin
1- mod
0 normal player

Read full topic
